mapper.select: SELECT e.id as eventId,title,content,e.time, CASE WHEN r.type = 1 THEN GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT r.url SEPARATOR ',') ELSE null END as imageStr, CASE WHEN r.type = 2 THEN GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT r.url SEPARATOR ',') ELSE null END as recordStr FROM event e LEFT JOIN user u ON e.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user_resource r ON r.event_id = e.id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
